verses.verse: Ye shall <S%H6213>make<s%> you <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H457>idols<s%> nor graven <S%H6459>image,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> rear you <S%H6965>up<s%> a standing <S%H4676>image,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall ye set <S%H5414>up<s%> any <S%H4906>image<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> in your <S%H776>land,<s%> to bow <S%H7812>down<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> it: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
Ye shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H7676>sabbaths,<s%> and <S%H3372>reverence<s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuary:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
If <S%H518><s%> ye <S%H1980>walk<s%> in my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them;

Then I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H1653>rain<s%> in due <S%H6256>season,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> her <S%H2981>increase,<s%> and the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> their <S%H6529>fruit.<s%>

And your <S%H1786>threshing<s%> shall <S%H5381>reach<s%> <S%H853><s%> unto the <S%H1210>vintage,<s%> and the <S%H1210>vintage<s%> shall <S%H5381>reach<s%> <S%H853><s%> unto the sowing <S%H2233>time:<s%> and ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> your <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H7648>full,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in your <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H983>safely.<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> and ye shall lie <S%H7901>down,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> shall make you <S%H2729>afraid:<s%> and I will <S%H7673>rid<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2416>beasts<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5674>go<s%> through your <S%H776>land.<s%>
And ye shall <S%H7291>chase<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and they shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

And <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> you shall <S%H7291>chase<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> and a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> you shall put ten thousand to <S%H7291>flight:<s%> <S%H7233><s%> and your <S%H341>enemies<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

For I will have <S%H6437>respect<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you, and make you <S%H6509>fruitful,<s%> <S%H853><s%> and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> you, and <S%H6965>establish<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> you.
And ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> old <S%H3465>store,<s%> <S%H3462><s%> and bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H3465>old<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H2319>new.<s%>
And I will <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you: and my <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1602>abhor<s%> you.
And I will <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you, and will <S%H1961>be<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H859>ye<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> my <S%H5971>people.<s%>

I <S%H589><s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> brought you <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> that ye should not <S%H4480>be<s%> <S%H1961><s%> their <S%H5650>bondmen;<s%> and I have <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H4133>bands<s%> of your <S%H5923>yoke,<s%> and made you <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6968>upright.<s%>
But <S%H518>if<s%> ye will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto me, and will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4687>commandments;<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> ye shall <S%H3988>despise<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> or <S%H518>if<s%> your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1602>abhor<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> so that ye will <S%H1115>not<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> but that ye <S%H6565>break<s%> <S%H853><s%> my covenant: <S%H1285><s%>

I <S%H589><s%> <S%H637>also<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> unto you; I will even <S%H6485>appoint<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you <S%H928>terror,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7829>consumption,<s%> and the burning <S%H6920>ague,<s%> that shall <S%H3615>consume<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and cause <S%H1727>sorrow<s%> of <S%H5315>heart:<s%> and ye shall <S%H2232>sow<s%> your <S%H2233>seed<s%> in <S%H7385>vain,<s%> for your <S%H341>enemies<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it.

And I will <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against you, and ye shall be <S%H5062>slain<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H341>enemies:<s%> they that <S%H8130>hate<s%> you shall <S%H7287>reign<s%> over you; and ye shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> when <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H7291>pursueth<s%> you.

And <S%H518>if<s%> ye will <S%H3808>not<s%> yet <S%H5704>for<s%> all <S%H428>this<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto me, then I will <S%H3256>punish<s%> you seven <S%H7651>times<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> your <S%H2403>sins.<s%>

And I will <S%H7665>break<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of your <S%H5797>power;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H8064>heaven<s%> as <S%H1270>iron,<s%> and your <S%H776>earth<s%> as brass: <S%H5154><s%>

And your <S%H3581>strength<s%> shall be <S%H8552>spent<s%> in <S%H7385>vain:<s%> for your <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5414>yield<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H2981>increase,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5414>yield<s%> their <S%H6529>fruits.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> ye <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H7147>contrary<s%> <S%H5973>unto<s%> me, and <S%H14>will<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto me; I will bring seven times <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H7651><s%> <S%H4347>plagues<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> you according to your <S%H2403>sins.<s%>

I will also <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7704>wild<s%> <S%H2416>beasts<s%> among you, which shall rob you of your <S%H7921>children,<s%> <S%H853><s%> and <S%H3772>destroy<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and make you few in <S%H4591>number;<s%> <S%H853><s%> and your high <S%H1870>ways<s%> shall be <S%H8074>desolate.<s%>
And <S%H518>if<s%> ye will <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H3256>reformed<s%> by me by these <S%H428>things,<s%> but will <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H7147>contrary<s%> <S%H5973>unto<s%> me;

Then will <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H7147>contrary<s%> <S%H5973>unto<s%> you, and will <S%H5221>punish<s%> you <S%H1571>yet<s%> seven <S%H7651>times<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> your <S%H2403>sins.<s%>

And I will <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> you, that shall <S%H5358>avenge<s%> the <S%H5359>quarrel<s%> of my <S%H1285>covenant:<s%> and when ye are gathered <S%H622>together<s%> <S%H413>within<s%> your <S%H5892>cities,<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you; and ye shall be <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy.<s%>

And when I have <S%H7665>broken<s%> the <S%H4294>staff<s%> of your <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> shall <S%H644>bake<s%> your <S%H3899>bread<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8574>oven,<s%> and they shall deliver you your bread <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H3899><s%> by <S%H4948>weight:<s%> and ye shall <S%H398>eat,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H7646>satisfied.<s%>
And <S%H518>if<s%> ye will <S%H3808>not<s%> for all <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto me, but <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H7147>contrary<s%> <S%H5973>unto<s%> me;

Then I will <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H7147>contrary<s%> <S%H5973>unto<s%> you also in <S%H2534>fury;<s%> and I, <S%H637>even<s%> <S%H589>I,<s%> will <S%H3256>chastise<s%> you seven <S%H7651>times<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> your <S%H2403>sins.<s%>
And ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall ye <S%H398>eat.<s%>

And I will <S%H8045>destroy<s%> <S%H853><s%> your high <S%H1116>places,<s%> and cut <S%H3772>down<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H2553>images,<s%> and <S%H5414>cast<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H6297>carcasses<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H6297>carcasses<s%> of your <S%H1544>idols,<s%> and my <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H1602>abhor<s%> you.

And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H2723>waste,<s%> and bring your sanctuaries unto <S%H8074>desolation,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4720><s%> and I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7306>smell<s%> the <S%H7381>savor<s%> of your sweet <S%H5207>odors.<s%>

And <S%H589>I<s%> will bring the land into <S%H8074>desolation:<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H776><s%> and your <S%H341>enemies<s%> which <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein shall be <S%H8074>astonished<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> it.

And I will <S%H2219>scatter<s%> you among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and will draw <S%H7324>out<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you: and your <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> and your <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H2723>waste.<s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> shall the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H7521>enjoy<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H7676>sabbaths,<s%> as long <S%H3605>as<s%> <S%H3117><s%> it lieth <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> and <S%H859>ye<s%> be in your <S%H341>enemies'<s%> <S%H776>land;<s%> even <S%H227>then<s%> shall the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H7673>rest,<s%> and <S%H7521>enjoy<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H7676>sabbaths.<s%>

As long <S%H3605>as<s%> <S%H3117><s%> it lieth <S%H8074>desolate<s%> it shall <S%H7673>rest;<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H834>because<s%> it did <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7673>rest<s%> in your <S%H7676>sabbaths,<s%> when ye <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it.

And upon them that are <S%H7604>left<s%> alive of you I will <S%H935>send<s%> a <S%H4816>faintness<s%> into their <S%H3824>hearts<s%> in the <S%H776>lands<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies;<s%> and the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of a <S%H5086>shaken<s%> <S%H5929>leaf<s%> shall <S%H7291>chase<s%> them; and they shall <S%H5127>flee,<s%> as <S%H4499>fleeing<s%> from a <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and they shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> when <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H7291>pursueth.<s%>

And they shall <S%H3782>fall<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> upon <S%H251>another,<s%> as it were <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> a <S%H2719>sword,<s%> when <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H7291>pursueth:<s%> and ye shall <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> power to <S%H8617>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H341>enemies.<s%>
And ye shall <S%H6>perish<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H341>enemies<s%> shall eat you <S%H398>up.<s%> <S%H853><s%>

And they that are <S%H7604>left<s%> of you shall pine <S%H4743>away<s%> in their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> in your <S%H341>enemies'<s%> <S%H776>lands;<s%> and <S%H637>also<s%> in the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%> shall they pine <S%H4743>away<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them.

If they shall <S%H3034>confess<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers,<s%> with their <S%H4604>trespass<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H4603>trespassed<s%> against me, and <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> they have <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H7147>contrary<s%> <S%H5973>unto<s%> me;

And that <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> have <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H7147>contrary<s%> <S%H5973>unto<s%> them, and have <S%H935>brought<s%> them into the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies;<s%> <S%H176>if<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> their <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H3824>hearts<s%> be <S%H3665>humbled,<s%> and they <S%H227>then<s%> <S%H7521>accept<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> the punishment of their iniquity: <S%H5771><s%>

Then will I <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and <S%H637>also<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H85>Abraham<s%> will I <S%H2142>remember;<s%> and I will <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

The <S%H776>land<s%> also shall be <S%H5800>left<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them, and shall <S%H7521>enjoy<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H7676>sabbaths,<s%> while she lieth <S%H8074>desolate<s%> <S%H4480>without<s%> them: and <S%H1992>they<s%> shall <S%H7521>accept<s%> <S%H853><s%> of the punishment of their <S%H5771>iniquity:<s%> <S%H3282>because,<s%> even <S%H3282>because<s%> they <S%H3988>despised<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and because their <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1602>abhorred<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes.<s%>

And <S%H637>yet<s%> for all <S%H1571>that,<s%> <S%H2063><s%> when they <S%H1961>be<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> I will <S%H3808>not<s%> cast them <S%H3988>away,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> will I <S%H1602>abhor<s%> them, to destroy them <S%H3615>utterly,<s%> and to <S%H6565>break<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>

But I will for their sakes <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of their <S%H7223>ancestors,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H853><s%> I brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> that I might <S%H1961>be<s%> their <S%H430>God:<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments<s%> and <S%H8451>laws,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>made<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> him and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
